game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple.
game.description: A powerful and mysterious energy is emanating from an ancient lost temple deep in the jungle. The temple's ancient artifact has been stolen, and it must be retrieved to prevent its power being misused.

task.description: The entrance to the lost temple is hidden behind a waterfall. You will need to navigate through the jungle to find it.
The ancient artifact is located in a chamber deep within the lost temple. Be careful, as traps and guardians protect it.
task.location: Lost Temple, Chamber of the Ancient Artifact

task.description: Once you have retrieved the artifact, return it to Ranger Edric in the village.
